info.instructions: The object of this game is very simple: find the letters Z, I, R, C, and H. They will be traveling along the screen hidden amongst a bunch of other letters, and you need to find them and click them before they move off the screen.

At first, the letters will all travel in the same direction, but every five rounds a new direction will be added so that they are eventually coming at you from every which way. Each round, you must find a certain number of targets in order to pass (as indicated above the playing field)
